article.title: Northrop Receives $781.5 Million Hawkeye Modification
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corporation, Bethpage, New York, is being awarded a $781.5 million contract modification for the manufacture and delivery of five low-rate initial production Lot 4 E-2D Advanced Hawkeye aircraft.Â The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Md., is the contracting activity.
